name: The 4th Conference on Ordinary Differential Equations and Dynamical Systems (CODEDS-N 2019)
content: Conference Date: November 22-24， 2019 Conference Venue: Guilin, China Website: http://www.novevents.org/conference/CODEDS-N2019/ Registration: http://www.novevents.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1193 Publication and Presentation Publication: Open Access Journal，please contact us for detailed information. Index: CNKI and Google Scholar Contact Us Email: rolin\_zhang@163.com Tel: +86 15172330844 QQ: 3025797047 Wechat: 3025797047 Call For Papers Theories of Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) Computational Ordinary Differential Equations Numerical Ordinary Differential Equations Integrating Differential Equations Systems of ODEs Solutions of ODEs Numerical Analysis and Methods Reduction of Order Software for ODE Solving Linear Dynamical Systems Local Dynamics Nonlinear Dynamical Systems and Chaos Arithmetic Dynamics Chaos Theory Control Theory Bifurcation Theory Ergodic Theory Complex Systems Graph Dynamical Systems Projected Dynamical Systems Symbolic Dynamics System Dynamics Topological Dynamics Applications of ODEs and Dynamical Systems Theory
